Xavi Puig Hernandez

I'm focused on Visual Design & the humanization of the User Experience

Hi! My name is Xavi Puig and I'm Product Designer based in Barcelona. Currently, I'm working as UX/UI Designer at Your New Self.

  • Linkedin
  • Behance
  • Dribbble

  • EXPERIENCE

    • Product Designer @ Your New Self
      2018 - Present

      Focused on project definition, wireframing, ux research and making the visual interface.

    • Project Lead @ Fourtastics
      2016 - 2019

      Conceptualization and design of web projects oriented to the user experience.

    • UX/UI Designer @ Movetia
      2017 - 2018

      Focused on the development of the visual interface of important financial companies.

    • Creative Director @ Roiback
      2010 - 2017

      Creative direction of web projects for hotels. Creation and development of the famous Backhotel booking engine.

    • Web Designer @ Hotusa Hotels
      2009 - 2010

      Web and graphic design for hotels and hotel chains within the business group.

    • Web Designer @ Adevinta
      2003 - 2006

      Focused on the engine section of the company, working in projects such as Coches.net, Motos.net, etc.

  • EDUCATION

    • Design Research @ UXER School
      2019

      Design Research. Research Methodology with quantitative and qualitative methods.

    • Interaction & Usability @ UOC
      2018

      Postgraduate specialization oriented to the user experience.

    • Gràfica Publicitària
      2006 - 2010

      Higher Grade of Gráfica Publicitaria. Included year of specialization.

    • Editorial Design @ Seeway
      2005 - 2006

      Specialization in Editorial Design and related software such as Adobe Indesign or QuarkXpress.
